Case Studies

Real-world engagements in critical system performance, stabilisation, modernisation, and enablement

Explore full project stories, including constraints, technical decisions, and outcomes. Start with the cards below and open any study for complete context.

  • All Studies
  • Database & Reporting Performance

Database Discipline Under Sales Pressure

Nordlicht Retail - German fashion retailer

Database & Reporting Performance Legacy Core Stabilisation

Problem: Mission-critical reports took four hours, crashed, and locked HQ systems.

Intervention: Query-plan forensics, indexing, view abstraction, and lock-safe reporting redesign.

Outcome: Runtime dropped from 4 hours to 30 minutes, with system locks removed.

Zero-Failure Inventory

Nordlicht Retail - German fashion retailer

Legacy Core Stabilisation Incremental System Modernisation

Problem: Legacy inventory software instability created tax and insurance compliance risk.

Intervention: Re-platformed to C# and SQL, local-first architecture, and high-touch rollout support.

Outcome: 0% failure rate across all 80 stores.

Hardening POS Infrastructure

Nordlicht Retail - German fashion retailer

Legacy Core Stabilisation

Problem: Dust-driven POS failures disrupted transactions and inventory sync.

Intervention: Ventilated enclosure redesign, hardened hardware builds, and maintenance protocol.

Outcome: Failure rate dropped to 1-2 incidents per quarter across the estate.

Monitoring Layer for Distributed Data Reliability

Nordlicht Retail - German fashion retailer

Legacy Core Stabilisation

Problem: Overnight store data transfers failed silently and planning teams discovered issues too late.

Intervention: VPN rollout support, heartbeat monitoring, dashboard visibility, and fallback retrieval paths.

Outcome: Real-time issue visibility replaced next-morning failure discovery.

Cross-Platform Rebuild for Measurement Software

Helios RF Systems - RF analyzer manufacturer

Incremental System Modernisation Legacy Core Stabilisation Efficient Team & Workflow Enablement

Problem: A legacy Windows codebase was unstable, slow to evolve, and hurting market perception.

Intervention: Qt and C++ re-architecture, modular migration, communication layer abstraction, and team enablement.

Outcome: Stable cross-platform product restored software as a market differentiator.

From Research Scripts to Deployable Agency Software

Canopy Metrics - forestry analytics venture

Incremental System Modernisation Efficient Team & Workflow Enablement

Problem: Mathematically strong research scripts were not deployable or maintainable for real users.

Intervention: Full desktop rebuild with structured interfaces, visualization stack, and maintainable workflow.

Outcome: Delivered a production-grade demonstrator with handover-ready codebase.

When the Webshop Was Ready-But the Back-End Wasn't

Skyline Access - aerial platform rental network

Legacy Core Stabilisation Incremental System Modernisation Efficient Team & Workflow Enablement

Problem: A launch-ready webshop had no integration path to the live rental system.

Intervention: DMZ architecture, CSP Gateway, and a REST API to expose complex availability logic.

Outcome: Webshop launched on schedule after three months of integration work.

When Offline Isn't Optional

Rhine Equipment Services - construction equipment dealer and service provider

Incremental System Modernisation Legacy Core Stabilisation

Problem: A hybrid Node.js/C# field app crashed, desynced, and failed in offline conditions.

Intervention: Rebuilt to C# WinForms with typed datasets, offline-first sync, and recovery safeguards.

Outcome: True offline work restored and user acceptance improved across the fleet.

From Chaos to Control

Ironbridge ERP - ERP vendor for equipment trade and rental

Legacy Core Stabilisation Incremental System Modernisation Efficient Team & Workflow Enablement

Problem: A 30-year ERP ran without version control or isolated development environments.

Intervention: Git adoption, branch separation, local environments, and automated installers.

Outcome: Service resolution time dropped from days to hours with stable deployments.

When Real-Time Became Possible Again

Ironbridge ERP - ERP vendor for equipment trade and rental

Database & Reporting Performance Legacy Core Stabilisation Efficient Team & Workflow Enablement

Problem: Nightly BI batch processing failed for large customers and broke trust in reporting.

Intervention: Replaced ETL with indexed SQL Views, runtime calculations, and side-by-side validation.

Outcome: Real-time reporting returned without disrupting daily ERP operations.

Digitalising Goods Receipt on Legacy Hardware

Atlas Heavy Industries - regional operation in a global equipment group

Legacy Core Stabilisation Incremental System Modernisation Efficient Team & Workflow Enablement

Problem: Goods receipts were paper-based and the existing ERP lacked a mobile interface.

Intervention: Built a Windows CE client and SOAP bridge with vendor-aligned interface design.

Outcome: Process became fully digital and ran for five years without software tickets.

From Black Box to Operating System (Jira Cloud)

Ironbridge ERP - mid-market ERP organisation

Incremental System Modernisation Legacy Core Stabilisation Efficient Team & Workflow Enablement

Problem: Work management was opaque, interrupt-driven, and fragmented across teams.

Intervention: Rolled out Jira Cloud with governance, routing rules, and pilot-led adoption.

Outcome: Company-wide rollout retired the legacy system and improved delivery clarity.
